title: Born-Infeld inflates Bianchi cosmologies
abstract: We present the study of spacetimes conformal to some Bianchi cosmologies with a Born-Infeld nonlinear electromagnetic source. We determine that the Born-Infeld field favours inflation. This effect is compared with the corresponding to a linear electromagnetic field; it turns out that for the same geometry, Maxwell field does not produce inflation. The energy conditions are analized as well, showing that the Born-Infeld field violates the strong energy condition.
